title: Welcome to my Robotics Portfolio!
description: Hello, I'm Abhishek, a first-year robotics graduate student attending Northeastern University. I have a bachelors degree in Mechanical Engineering. But, I always fancied software development. My curiosity led me to learn new tech and allowed me to collaborate with a lot of experienced developers in the industry. Currently, I am learning computer vision and supervised machine learning. My current research is on improvising Lane detection using Hough transform.
